Class DraftPoolFiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.view.gui.DraftPoolFiller

  • public class DraftPoolFiller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the display of the draft pool.
    Author:
    dvdmff

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DraftPoolFiller(javafx.scene.layout.HBox diceContainer)
      Creates a new DraftPoolFiller instance that will use the specified HBox to display dice.

        Parameters:
